speaker: Agent
text: Hello and thank you for contacting General Corporation. Before we start may I have your first and last name?

text: Eduardo Sheryl

speaker: Agent
text: And what is your account number?

text: It's seven six six four three eight six six six three I think.

text: And your social security number?

speaker: Client
text: It's nine three eight seven four seven nine one five.

text: It's Nita@icloud.com

text: Thank you Eduardo. How may I help you today?

text: I'm trying to pay my bill but it's not working.

text: Ok is this the first time you've tried to make the payment?

speaker: Client
text: yes

speaker: Agent
text: Ok I can help you with that. Are you trying to pay with a bank draft or a credit card?

speaker: Client
text: I'm paying with my debit card.

text: thirteen dollars eighty three cents and fourty eighteen dollars thirty eight cents

text: What is the name of the bank for your debit card?

text: Sorry I meant five hundred even. My bank is Wells Fargo.

text: Can you please confirm the debit card number for me please?

text: It's three nine five two oh six zero five five eight zero six three two eight

text: and the expiration?

text: July of two thousand twenty three

text: And the CV code?

speaker: Client

speaker: Agent
text: It's a three digit number usually on the back of your debit card next to the signature strip.

speaker: Client
text: Oh ok. It's zero seven five nine or four one two

speaker: Agent
text: When did you want the payment to process?

speaker: Client
text: Can you make the payment process tomorrow please?

speaker: Agent
text: Do I have your authorization to run your debit card in the amount of forty nine dollars seventy eight cents?

speaker: Client
text: Yes.

speaker: Agent
text: Ok one moment please while I run your debit card.

speaker: Client
text: Ok

speaker: Agent
text: The system is telling me that it needs your physical address associated with the card.

speaker: Client
text: Ok. It's four one three main street in Deluth Georgia in the United States. The zip is four nine two six nine or four nine two six nine.

speaker: Agent
text: I also need a phone number associated with the account.

speaker: Client
text: It’s probably my cell phone. That's four three six eight nine three four five eight four. It could also be my land line which is nine seven nine six seven zero five seven four seven.

speaker: Agent
text: And what is your four digit PIN code?

speaker: Client
text: I believe it's seven five six five. Or it could be seven nine zero three

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that information. I will try running the transaction again.

speaker: Client
text: Ok thanks.

speaker: Agent
text: The payment was successful. You should get an email confirmation that a payment in the amount of forty nine dollars seventy eight cents was made on August eleventh at eleven fifty nine AM. Is there anything else I can help you with?

speaker: Client
text: And you're one hundred percent sure it went through?

speaker: Agent
text: Yes the payment was successful.

speaker: Client
text: Nope that's it.
